abilities.name: Darkness Restore
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Honchkrow is your Active Pokémon and your opponent's Bench isn't full, you may use this power. Search your opponent's discard pile for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto his or her Bench. This power can't be used if Honchkrow is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Riot
attacks.effect: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Pokémon that isn't an Evolved Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's).
